Row.Text: Indicates this City is the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital of the empire. Contains 1 slot for a Great Work of Art.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_CONNECTED] Connecting other Cities to the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital by Road will produce additional [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
{building_heroic_epic_flag}Heroic Epic

All newly-trained non-air Units in this City receive the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Morale[ENDCOLOR] Promotion, improving [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength by 15%. Contains 1 slot for a Great Work of Writing.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must have built a Barracks in all Cities. The cost goes up the more cities there are in the empire.{building_heroic_epic_location}
{building_national_college_flag}National College
Must have built a Library in all Cities. The cost goes up the more cities there are in the empire.{building_national_college_location}
{building_national_epic_flag}National Epic

+25% [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People generation in this City. Contains 1 slot for a Great Work of Writing.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must have built a Monument in all Cities. The cost goes up the more cities there are in the empire.{building_national_epic_location}
{building_circus_maximus_flag}Circus Maximus
Must have built a Colosseum in all Cities. The cost goes up the more cities there are in the empire.{building_circus_maximus_location}
{building_national_treasury_flag}East India Company

Must have built a Market in all Cities. The cost goes up the more cities there are in the empire. Trade routes other players make to a city with an East India Company will generate an extra 4 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for the city owner and the trade route owner gains an additional 2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for the trade route.{building_national_treasury_location}
{building_ironworks_flag}Ironworks
Must have built a Workshop in all Cities. The cost goes up the more cities there are in the empire.{building_ironworks_location}
{building_oxford_university_flag}Oxford University

1 Free Technology. Contains 2 slots for Great Works of Writing.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must have built a University in all Cities. The cost goes up the more cities there are in the empire.{building_oxford_university_location}
{building_hermitage_flag}Hermitage

+50% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in this City. Contains 3 slots for Great Works of Art.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must have built an Opera House in all Cities. The cost goes up the more cities there are in the empire.{building_hermitage_location}
{building_intelligence_agency_flag}National Intelligence Agency

Provides an additional spy and levels up all your existing spies. Also provides a 15% reduction in enemy spy effectiveness. Must have a Police Station in all cities.{building_intelligence_agency_location}
{building_grand_temple_flag}Grand Temple

Doubles religious pressure emanating from this City.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must be built in a Holy City. Must have built a Temple in all Cities. The cost goes up the more cities there are in the empire.{building_grand_temple_location}
{building_tourist_center_flag}National Visitor Center

Must have built a Hotel in all Cities. The cost goes up the more cities there are in the empire. 100% of the [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from World Wonders, Natural Wonders, and Improvements (Landmarks, Moai, Chateau) is added to the [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output of the city. [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output from Great Works +100%.{building_tourist_center_location}
{building_writers_guild_flag}Writers' Guild

Provides 1 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person Point (GPP) towards a Great Writer. Add up to two specialists to this building to gain [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and increase the rate of Great Writer acquisition (3 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and 3 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] GPP per specialist).{building_writers_guild_location}
{building_artists_guild_flag}Artists' Guild

Provides 2 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person Points (GPP) towards a Great Artist. Add up to two specialists to this building to gain [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and increase the rate of Great Artist acquisition (3 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and 3 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] GPP per specialist).{building_artists_guild_location}
{building_musicians_guild_flag}Musicians' Guild

Provides 3 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person Points (GPP) towards a Great Musician. Add up to two specialists to this building to gain [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and increase the rate of Great Musician acquisition (3 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and 3 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] GPP per specialist).{building_musicians_guild_location}
